publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-214 Rhona Brankin: National Endometriosis Awareness Dayâ€”That the Parliament welcomes National Endometriosis Awareness Day on 2 July 2003; notes that endometriosis is a gynaecological disease that affects up to two million women in the United Kingdom causing extreme pain, infertility, depression and incapacity for work or social interaction, and recognises the need to raise awareness of this condition. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-214 National Endometriosis Awareness Day (lodged on 1 July 2003) Irene Oldfather*, Mr Adam Ingram*
